DOC.brief_summary: This randomise , control , double-blinded clinical study investigate safety efficacy MBD combination PZQ treatment SCH STH child age 1-15 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Drug Combinations Against Schistosomiasis
DOC.criteria: Those age 115 year age Are infect schistosomiasis soiltransmitted helminthiasis Whose parent consent willing participate Those acute chronic disease schistosomiasis soiltransmitted helminthiasis Those history serious adverse drug reaction
